package.name: scigl_render
package.description: Library to simplify rendering objects via OpenGL. The intendet use case is scientific (e.g. probabalistic filtering). It is not supposed to be a full rendering engine and the usage is relatively low level. The rendering behaviour can be changed by supplying your own shaders. A key feature is the inclusion of calibrated cameras to simulate a real camera. Besides rendering a scene to the screen, a use case is rendering several object poses offscreen to an offscreen buffer and reading it back into CPU memory via pixel buffer objects. The library supports loading from many common 3D model file formats (via assimp).
